Training drills like these are held twice a year to help emergency and clinical care teams plan and prepare for possible mass casualty incidents.

Here is some news about an honor for a deserving local person:
Recently retired music educator and Montezuma Cortez Band Director Rodney Ritthaler was awarded the prestigious Colorado Bandmasters Association‚Äôs 2020 Hall of Fame Award. Mr. Ritthaler retired from Montezuma Cortez HS in 2018, after an extremely successful teaching career. This honor is given to just one Colorado band director each year. Mr. Ritthaler is only the 45th music educator to receive this award since 1976. The 400 member Colorado Bandmasters Association was asked to vote for this year‚Äôs award recipient, and Mr. Ritthaler was inducted into the CBA Hall of Fame at their annual convention membership meeting, which was held online on July 17, 2020. The entire Montezuma Cortez High School community can be so proud for receiving such a great honor bestowed upon their wonderful past band director, Rodney Ritthaler.
